author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: See who Deepika Padukone spent her Valentine‚Äôs Day with | Hindi Movie News
text:
Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh make for the most ideal couple and constantly give their fans relationship goals. While the whole world celebrated Valentine's Day on February 14, with their special someone, Miss. Padukone had a very unusual, yet special V-Day.
Deepika's date yesterday was not her alleged boyfriend but her stylist Shaleena Nathani .
An elated Shaleena took to Twitter to share a picture with the gorgeous actress and captioned it- "I got the hottest valentine in town @deepikapadukone". Well, the picture speaks for itself. Even in a bathrobe and with zero makeup on, the actress looks as stunning as ever. Perfect girly date, isn't it?
I got the hottest valentine in town ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüòò @deepikapadukone üòâ
A post shared by Shaleena Nathani (@shaleenanathani) on Feb 15, 2017 at 6:27am PST
Deepika also uploaded a masked picture of her girl gang on Instagram and wrote- #MyGirls Happy Valentines Day! #missingmygirls
#MyGirls ‚ù§Happy Valentines Day! ‚ù§#missingmygirls
A post shared by Deepika Padukone (@deepikapadukone) on Feb 14, 2017 at 9:09pm PST
On the work front, Deepika is busy with 'Padmavati' which also stars Ranveer Singh and Shahid Kapoor .
